content:
Hi there,
I got a question about a tag for a patient's medical condition: For the purpose of dashboarding/reporting in our hospital, patients are selected by their medical condition through a question-field in a consultation-questionnaire (not by their diagnosis); how should/could I model this in a FHIR profile? Using the questionnaire resource, via the problem resource, or something else?

Hope you can help me out. Thanks in advance!
To add on that; this 'diagnosis-in-a-questionnaire', should we model it to e.g. https://simplifier.net/nictizstu3-zib2017/zib-problem or to another/new profile (non-Nictiz, non-ZIB?)
This looks like an instantiation of the zib Problem (https://zibs.nl/wiki/Problem-v4.1(2017EN)) to me. The FHIR STU3 profile for that is here: https://simplifier.net/NictizSTU3-Zib2017/zib-problem

Note that if you have modeling issues and want some face to face time, that one of the places you could think about is the HL7 NL WGM -- https://www.hl7.nl/events/events/intern/bijeenkomsten/10e-hl7-nederland-working-group-meeting-8-9-november-2018.html

We normally run 4 quarters of FHIR 'stuff' and have an open mic in the first.
